Convert locations of im3d voxel grid into XYZ coordinates

Convert locations of im3d voxel grid into XYZ coordinates

imexpand.grid(d)

Arguments

d
An im3d object

Value

Nx3 matrix of image coordindates

See also

expand.grid

Other im3d: as.im3d, boundingbox, im3d-coords, im3d-io, im3d, imslice, is.im3d, mask, origin, projection, threshold, unmask, voxdims

Examples

d=im3d(,dim=c(2,3,2),origin=c(10,20,30),voxdims=c(1,2,3))
imexpand.grid(d)
#>       [,1] [,2] [,3]
#>  [1,]   10   20   30
#>  [2,]   11   20   30
#>  [3,]   10   22   30
#>  [4,]   11   22   30
#>  [5,]   10   24   30
#>  [6,]   11   24   30
#>  [7,]   10   20   33
#>  [8,]   11   20   33
#>  [9,]   10   22   33
#> [10,]   11   22   33
#> [11,]   10   24   33
#> [12,]   11   24   33

  • Value
